-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A lightweight implementation of a subset of Hspec's API
--   
@package nanospec
@version 0.2.1


-- | A lightweight implementation of a subset of Hspec's API.
module Test.Hspec
data SpecM a
type Spec = SpecM ()
describe :: String -> Spec -> Spec
context :: String -> Spec -> Spec
it :: String -> Expectation -> Spec
type Expectation = IO ()
expect :: String -> Bool -> Expectation
shouldBe :: (Show a, Eq a) => a -> a -> Expectation
shouldReturn :: (Show a, Eq a) => IO a -> a -> Expectation
hspec :: Spec -> IO ()
instance Typeable ExpectationFailure
instance Eq Result
instance Show Result
instance Show ExpectationFailure
instance Eq ExpectationFailure
instance Exception ExpectationFailure
instance Monoid Summary
instance Monad SpecM
instance Applicative SpecM
instance Functor SpecM
